author: Medal Melodies

text: Still one of my favorite games I played on the XBLA, a great beat 'em up with an equally good soundtrack by Anamanaguchi. Ubisoft Montreal did good with this one, it's always refreshing to see big companies make smaller, cheaper quality games. If you like classics like River City Ransom or Double Dragon, definitely try this game.
